document_data.name: Well of Destiny
document_data.mainbody: The '''Well of Destiny''' was an [[enchanted]] pool of water located in the [[Weeping Desert]] of the northern [[Haunted Lands]] of [[interior Zakhara]].
document_data.Powers: Drinking the waters of the Well of Destiny imparted glimpses of one's future.
document_data.History: [[Ardasir al-Darah]] the Incomparable, a sheikh of the [[Jann of the Haunted Lands]], drank from the Well and saw a vision of himself ruling the [[jann]] as amir.
